main event: Observation of a luminous round object hovering above the highway near Mobile, Alabama on 6 October 1959.
interesting points: The object was approximately 30 to 40 feet in diameter and rotated slowly., It was estimated to be 300 to 500 feet above the highway., The object illuminated the surrounding area as bright as day., The sighting lasted for 2 to 3 minutes before the object accelerated and disappeared., The incident was reported to authorities due to the shaken state of the witnesses.
witness description: traveling on U.S. Highway 90 west of Mobile, Alabama
